[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][et_pb_row_inner use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#ffffff” width=”70vw” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”40px|||-30vw||” custom_margin_tablet=”30px|||0vw” custom_margin_phone=”0px||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”60px|50px|70px|50px|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|40px|50px|40px|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” background_last_edited=”on|phone” background_enable_color_phone=”off” box_shadow_style=”preset2″ box_shadow_vertical=”28px” box_shadow_blur=”40px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.1)” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column_inner saved_specialty_column_type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Engine
Model & Type Indo Farm – 3065 DI; Four Cylinder, Water Cooled Diesel Engine Rated power 60 hp max @2200 rpm.
Transmission
Type Heavy duty transmission for crane application. Sliding mesh Spur teeth gearbox, Eight forward and two reverse speeds with high and low selector.
AXLE
Front Rigid
Rear Rigid Mounted with oscillation
Speed(top) 30 kmph.
Gradeability 40% unladen
Clutch Single plate, heavy duty dry friction type clutch plate especially designed for crane application.
Driv 2 wheel drive
STEERING
Type Articulated power steering, hydraulically controlled through two double acting hydraulic rams.
Articulation upto 40°
Turning Radius 8.5 m
BRAKES
Front wheel Fully air operated ‘S’ cam dual circuit brakes.
Rear wheel Mechanical disc brakes, actuated through pneumatic brake chamber.
Parking Air operated fail safe brakes on front wheels.
TYRE
Front 11.00×20 – 16 PR (4 Nos.)
Rear 14.00×25 – 20 PR (2 Nos.)
Wheel Base 4.95 m
Wheel Tracks
Front & Rear 1880 mm (center of twin wheels) / 1630 mm
BOOM
Telescoping 4 part boom, 3 part hydraulically powered & fully synchronised. 4th part power extended and manually pinned for safety.
Derricking Through two double acting cylinders.
HOIST MECHANISM
Hoist Four/Six falls with fail safe brake.
HYDRAULIC SYSTEM
Pump Vane type hydraulic pump.
Control Valve 3/5/6 spool control valve double acting with built in pressure relief valve for trouble free operation.
ELECTRICAL SYSTEM
Type 12V, DC Single battery negative earth.
OVERALL DIMENSIONS
Length 11375 mm
Width 2450 mm
Height 2945 mm
OPERATING WEIGHT 13270 Kg

[/et_pb_code][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.indofarm.in/brochure/crane/Indo_Power_16%20FNX.pdf” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Download Brochure” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291″ custom_margin=”25px||25px||true|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291%22:%91%22button_text_color%22%93}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||2px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”50px|0px|50px|15px|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_css_main_element__hover_enabled=”off|desktop”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”2caebda7-1c6a-4d05-9d5d-92ad76e16d75″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”left” header_text_color=”#21B354″ header_font_size=”3rem” header_letter_spacing=”5px” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”1.5rem” header_2_line_height=”2.5rem” header_3_font_size=”3rem” background_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”10%||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”10%||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”3rem” header_font_size_phone=”2rem” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_letter_spacing_tablet=”5px” header_letter_spacing_phone=”3px” header_letter_spacing_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Engine Power: 60 hp@2200 rpm

<title>Indo Power 17FNX Crane with 4-Cylinder Engine | Indo Farm</title>
<meta name="description" content="This crane has a four cylinder, water cooled diesel engine with a 60 HP engine, this crane has a boom height of 19.2 m with a horizontal reach of 16.6 m." />

<meta property="og:url" content="https://www.indofarm.in/equipment/indo-power-17fnx/" />
